cast.name: 海伦·伯格斯霍姆 Helene Bergsholm

introduction: On a bridge , a woman meets her ex. She gives to him his clothes and the references to their relation become more clear and darker. His abuses against her, his incapacity to offer excuses, his excuses as accusations against her, his paranoia and brutality direct reveled, the intervention of a stranger are pieces of this remarkable one - take short in which, in a sort of spy system, you discover the couple, their talk, the people passing on bridge and the essence of this meeting , a sort of confrontation against past and second chance. In short, just admirable work, reminding a profound painful reality from near us.
